amendment.description: To express the sense of Congress regarding the designation of National Monuments.

vote.text: Amendment SA 132, under the order of 1/27/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 47. Record Vote Number: 37.

action.text: Amendment SA 132 proposed by Senator Daines to Amendment SA 2. (consideration: CR S402; text: CR S402) To express the sense of Congress regarding the designation of National Monuments.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 132, under the order of 1/27/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 47. Record Vote Number: 37.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 132, under the order of 1/27/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 47. Record Vote Number: 37.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 132 proposed by Senator Daines to Amendment SA 2.
